description.value: Quality codes for qualities with which a device can perform measuring

definition.value: Quality value where no derivation rule logic nor values are expected
Unknown quality (Unlikely to be adequate if a quality value is expected)

display.value: Error in deriving or determining the quality

definition.value: Quality value could not be derived due to insufficient input, unknown/unavailable logic, or other error

value.value: Udstyrskvaliteten kunne ikke bestemmes grundet manglende input, utilgængelig logik, eller anden fejl.

definition.value: Low precision/credibility grade device quality. Typically such device is not clinical grade.

display.value: Degraded quality for low precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Degraded quality for low precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is not clinical grade.

value.value: Forringet kvalitet for udstyr med lav præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Normal/neutral quality for low precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Normal/neutral quality for low precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is not clinical grade.

value.value: Normal kvalitet for udstyr med lav præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Quality for uncalibrated low precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Quality for uncalibrated low precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is not clinical grade.

value.value: Kvalitet for ukalibreret udstyr med lav præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Quality for calibrated low precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Quality for calibrated low precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is not clinical grade.

value.value: Kvalitet for kalibreret udstyr med lav præcision eller pålidelighed

definition.value: High precision/credibility grade device quality. Typically such device is clinical grade.

display.value: Degraded quality for high precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Degraded quality for high precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is clinical grade.

value.value: Forringet kvalitet for udstyr med høj præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Normal/neutral quality for high precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Normal/neutral quality for high precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is clinical grade.

value.value: Normal kvalitet for udstyr med høj præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Quality for uncalibrated high precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Quality for uncalibrated high precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is clinical grade.

value.value: Kvalitet for ukalibreret udstyr med høj præcision eller pålidelighed

display.value: Quality for calibrated high precision/credibility grade device

definition.value: Quality for calibrated high precision/credibility grade device. Typically such device is clinical grade.

value.value: Kvalitet for kalibreret udstyr med høj præcision eller pålidelighed
